verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wife \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Elisha, “\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* husband, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w creditor|strong="H5383"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w coming|strong="H5030"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*!”

“\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* Elisha. “\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?” \w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* jar \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.”

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*,” said Elisha, “\w borrow|strong="H7592"\w* \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w neighbors|strong="H7934"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3212"\w* gather \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w few|strong="H4591"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H5265"\w* inside, \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w behind|strong="H1157"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* oil \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w*, \w setting|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* \w aside|strong="H5265"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5066"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* left \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H1992"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H5462"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w behind|strong="H1157"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* kept \w bringing|strong="H5066"\w* jars \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* kept pouring.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w*, \w she|strong="H3627"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, “\w Bring|strong="H5066"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w*.” \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* replied, “\w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H5975"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w flowing|strong="H3627"\w*.

She \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* said, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w your|strong="H5046"\w* \w debt|strong="H5386"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5046"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w can|strong="H1121"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w on|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w remainder|strong="H3498"\w*.”

\w One|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* Elisha \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Shunem|strong="H7766"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prominent|strong="H1419"\w* woman \w who|strong="H5493"\w* \w lived|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w persuaded|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H3899"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w whenever|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H5493"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H5493"\w* \w stop|strong="H5493"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* woman said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* husband, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* often \w comes|strong="H5674"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H5674"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w of|strong="H6918"\w* God.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w room|strong="H5944"\w* upstairs \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w chair|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lamp \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* stay \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w One|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* Elisha \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* visit \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* \w upper|strong="H5944"\w* \w room|strong="H5944"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, “\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* woman.” \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H5975"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* had \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w*, \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H3427"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H4994"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, ‘\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* gone \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* trouble \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*? \w Can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* behalf \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w or|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*?’” “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H8432"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*,” \w she|strong="H2063"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w*?” “Well, \w she|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,” \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H6213"\w* husband \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.”

“\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w*,” \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7121"\w*. \w So|strong="H7121"\w* Gehazi \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w doorway|strong="H6607"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Elisha declared, “\w At|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w next|strong="H2416"\w* \w year|strong="H6256"\w*, \w you|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hold \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* arms.” “No, \w my|strong="H2088"\w* lord,” \w she|strong="H6256"\w* said. “\w Do|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w lie|strong="H3576"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.”

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w did|strong="H6256"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H2416"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w next|strong="H2416"\w* \w year|strong="H6256"\w* \w she|strong="H6256"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* Elisha \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w her|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* father, who \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* harvesters.

“\w My|strong="H5375"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*! \w My|strong="H5375"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*!” he complained \w to|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* father. \w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* father told \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, “\w Carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* mother.”

\w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* servant \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w picked|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* mother, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* boy \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w* \w lap|strong="H1290"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5927"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* man \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* door \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* woman \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* husband \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* donkeys, \w that|strong="H5288"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w quickly|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

“\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w would|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H1980"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*?” \w he|strong="H3117"\w* replied. “\w It|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moon|strong="H2320"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*.” “Everything \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* right,” \w she|strong="H2320"\w* said.

\w Then|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* donkey \w and|strong="H3212"\w* told \w her|strong="H3212"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, “\w Drive|strong="H5090"\w* onward; do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w slow|strong="H6113"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pace|strong="H7392"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3212"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* she set \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distance, \w he|strong="H3212"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* woman.

\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w out|strong="H7323"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w her|strong="H7125"\w* \w and|strong="H7965"\w* ask, ‘\w Are|strong="H3206"\w* \w you|strong="H6258"\w* all right? \w Is|strong="H3206"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* husband all right? \w Is|strong="H3206"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* all right?’” \w And|strong="H7965"\w* she answered, “Everything \w is|strong="H3206"\w* all right.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* reached \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* clung \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*. \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w came|strong="H5066"\w* \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w push|strong="H1920"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Leave|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w alone|strong="H7503"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5046"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w deep|strong="H2388"\w* distress, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5956"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.”
